description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; two men hold the end of a coffin; the man on the left wears a tall hat
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck / g [?] E.65 | URC of sheet, in pencil: 11 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: #1927
portfolio: From Plate 11 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel.
title: Akaki is Carried to the Grave, Plate 11 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
